name: Executive Summary
prompt: Summarize the meeting into 5–7 bullet points focusing on decisions, blockers, owners, and next steps. Keep it concise and scannable.

name: Action Items (JSON)
prompt: From the transcript, extract ALL action items and output ONLY a valid JSON array. Each item must be: {"title":"","owner":"","due":"YYYY-MM-DD","notes":""}. Do not include any extra text.
